amendment.description: An amendment numbered 86 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds made available by this Act may be used to fund any grant related to any transgenic edible vaccine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
